title: Why doesnt Wilmington bury power lines to avoid storm damage and car accidents,as well as to make the community look nicer?
text:
Many new residential subdivisions and other construction projects
commonly use underground power lines, burying higher-voltage
transmission lines underground poses some problems. For more, see this
information from Progress Energy:

http://progress-energy.com/aboutenergy/transmission/florida/faq.asp#b6
